description:
Careless Pom: Pom, a Lemon Flavored Mouse Zooble received a letter from Panky about something while on the other hand Coron and Panky received a letter from him, explaining Panky`s close relation. Meanwhile Chevy caught a cold and is in her flower house all day as Pom greeted her but was told not to go near her due to her cold. But he actually mistold the whole thing to Randy, a Pudding flavored Koala Zooble, which makes her seriously mad to her and also to Pom. To correct everything on Pom`s mistakes, Chevy, Coron and Panky asked Kumampa for advice.
Mell, Rin and the Rainbow Sea: Chevy and her friends received a letter from Mel, a Pink Grapefruit flavored seahorse Zooble to come and play with her. The three agrees and later met up with Mel and her friend fish Gonzales. As they dive underwater, they later met Rin, a Blue Hawaii flavored fish Zooble and told them about the Rainbow Pot being stolen by someone. As they found out who`s the culprit, Chevy and the others decides to get the pot back.

titles.title: Careless Pom / Mell, Rin and the Rainbow Sea
Ukkari Pom-kun / Niji no Umi no Mell to Rin
うっかりポムくん / 虹の海のメルとリン
